original_text: And Jesus said unto them, Because of your unbelief: for verily I say unto you, If ye have faith as a grain of mustard seed, ye shall say unto this mountain, Remove hence to yonder place; and it shall remove; and nothing shall be impossible unto you.
korean_text: 이르시되 너희 믿음이 작은 까닭이니라 진실로 너희에게 이르노니 만일 너희에게 믿음이 겨자씨 한 알 만큼만 있어도 이 산을 명하여 여기서 저기로 옮겨지라 하면 옮겨질 것이요 또 너희가 못할 것이 없으리라

sentences.original_text: for verily I say unto you
If ye have faith as a grain of mustard seed
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 너희가 겨자씨 한 알 만한 믿음이 있으면

sentences.original_text: ye shall say unto this mountain
and nothing shall be impossible unto you
